formattedAddress: 282 Lenox Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 282 Lenox Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Mimi for an eyebrow microblading procedure, and my experience was nothing short of amazing. After searching for the perfect specialist, I found Mimi, who came as a much-needed answer to my beauty needs. My previous microblading experience, which was excellent, had been about eight years ago. I hadn't found someone else I could trust with the task ‚Äî until I found Mimi.

From our initial phone conversation, I knew I was in good hands. Mimi patiently answered all my questions, demonstrating her expertise and understanding of my concerns. This conversation was enough to convince me to book an appointment.

Visiting Mimi's studio was a delightful experience. She walked me through the entire process, reiterating everything we had discussed on the phone and ensuring I was comfortable and informed every step of the way. Mimi's attention to detail was exceptional. She took before and after photos and meticulously outlined my eyebrows. This allowed me to see the proposed shape and make necessary adjustments before the actual microblading took place.

The results were fantastic. My eyebrows look amazing ‚Äî Mimi's skill and precision are evident in the quality of her work. Her dedication to detail and willingness to take the time to get everything right really stood out to me. I'm thrilled with the outcome and confident that these results will last three years, as Mimi explained.

I wholeheartedly recommend Mimi to anyone considering microblading. Whether you're a first-timer or looking for a touch-up, Mimi's expertise and warm approach make her the go-to professional in this field. I'm already looking forward to my next appointment for a touch-up, knowing I'll be in the best of hands.

Mimi was fantastic! I decided to get my sparse brows enhanced, expecting pretty okay results or a disaster I'd have to live with üòÜ.
I was totally in shock with the results! My eyebrows came out great, she was very thorough in explaining the steps she was taking, suggesting the finish and  aftercare. I couldn't be anymore pleased! Thanks Mimi!

originalText.text: Mimi works with surgical precision. She made me feel comfortable and relaxed. My results are beautiful and natural.

text.text: Mimi works with surgical precision. She made me feel comfortable and relaxed. My results are beautiful and natural.

originalText.text: Mimi is truly an artist who cares about her craft. Her attention to detail is impeccable and she goes to great lengths to make sure you're happy with the results. I've been getting so many compliments on my brows, which is something I'm not used to at all but I'm loving it! Highly, highly recommend!
